channel.title: Add indicator measure "other" to the codelist (excluded 2.03)
channel.description:
**Title** Add indicator measure "other" to the codelist
**Standard** Activity
**Schema Object** iati-activities/iati-activity/result/indicator/@measure
**Type of Change** Add a code to the codelist
**Issue** Some indicators can be expressed as numerical values but are not units or percentages. Most notable example: scales. At the moment, these can only be added by misrepresenting them as either units or percentages.
**Proposal** Since there are different types of scales and perhaps other types of quantitative indicators as well, adding a generic category "other" allows to stop misrepresenting the type of measure.
**Standards Day** Not in the list
**Links** http://iatistandard.org/202/codelists/IndicatorMeasure/
